content: अतिशयः [शी-अच्] {@--1@} Excess, preeminence excellence; वीर्य° <ls>R. 3. 62</ls>; महिम्नां… अतिशयः <ls>U. 4. 21</ls>; तस्मिन् विधानातिशये विधातुः <ls>R. 6. 11</ls> excellence, highest perfection of art. {@--2@} Superiority (in quality, rank, quantity &c.); महार्घस्तीर्थानामिव हि महतां कोप्यतिशयः <ls>U. 6. 11</ls>; oft in <ab>comp.</ab> with adjectives, in the sense of ‘exceedingly’, ‘excessively’; °रमणीयः <ls>Mu. 3</ls>; आसीदतिशयप्रेक्ष्यः <ls>R. 17. 25</ls>; मुक्तागुणातिशयसंभृतमंडनश्रीः <ls>V. 5. 19</ls>; or with nouns, meaning ‘excellent’, ‘excessive’, ‘very great’; °रयः, अश्वातिशयं <ls>K. 80</ls> the best of horses; °दारिद्र्योपहताः. {@--3@} Advantageous result, one of the superhuman qualities attributed to Jaina saints. {%--<ab>a.</ab>%} [अतिशयः अस्त्यर्थे अच्] Superior, pre-eminent, excessive, very great, abundant.
